title: Romeo's Crippling Anxiety Almost Stopped Him From Doing This
description:
When it comes to sales people, our producer Romeo has a hard time saying no. So it was very difficult for him to cancel his second gym membership. He was nervous leading up to pulling the trigger.
How did he get out of the situation? By doing something we never expected. Listen...
